title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 431.2 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 431.2 - Eligibility

State Regulations

This rule shall apply to employers who are eligible for
either a premium credit in accordance with subdivision (6) or a reduction in
their required security deposit in accordance with subdivision (7) of section
134
of the Workers' Compensation Law and to safety and loss management specialists
certified pursuant to Part 60 of this Title who develop and recommend safety
incentive plans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
431.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
